name: TemperatureThreshold
help: Defines how fast the fan runs at different temperatures

fields.name: UpThreshold
fields.help: NBFC will select the next upper threshold as soon as the temperature exceeds *UpThreshold*. in celsius

fields.name: DownThreshold
fields.help: NBFC will select the next lower threshold as soon as the temperature falls below the *DownThreshold*. in celsius

fields.name: FanSpeed
fields.help: The fan speed in percent

name: FanSpeedPercentageOverride
help: Overrides the default algorithm to calculate fan speeds

fields.name: FanSpeedPercentage
fields.help: The fan speed in percent

fields.name: FanSpeedValue
fields.help: Fan fan speed value which will be written to WriteRegister

fields.name: TargetOperation
fields.help:
Defines for which operations the speeds should be overridden:

- Read: Value->Percentage
- Write: Percentage->Value
- ReadWrite: both

name: RegisterWriteConfiguration
help: Allows to write to any EC register

fields.name: WriteMode
fields.help:
Defines how the value will be written:

- And: register = register bitwise_and value
- Or: register = register bitwise_or value
- Set register = value

fields.name: WriteOccasion
fields.help:
Defines when the value should be written:

- OnInitialization: writes the value once upon initialization (everytimee the fan control service is enabled or a config is applied)
- OnWriteFanSpeed: writes the value everytimee the fan speed is set.

fields.name: Register
fields.help: The register which will be manipulated.

fields.name: Value
fields.help: The Value which will be written

fields.name: ResetRequired
fields.help: Defines if the register should be reset before the service is shut down.

fields.name: ResetValue
fields.help: The value which will be written upon reset.

fields.name: ResetWriteMode
fields.help: See WriteMode. Will only be applied on reset. Valid values: Set/And/Or

fields.name: Description
fields.help: A short description of what effect the RegisterWriteConfiguration will have

name: FanConfiguration
help: Defines how NBFC controls a fan

fields.name: FanDisplayName
fields.help: Fan display name

fields.name: ReadRegister
fields.help: The register from which NBFC reads the fan speed.

fields.name: WriteRegister
fields.help: The register which NBFC uses to control the fan

fields.name: MinSpeedValue
fields.help: The value which puts the fan to the lowest possible speed (usually this stops the fan). Must be an integer between 0 and 255 or 0 and 65535 if ReadWriteWords is `true`. Note: MinSpeedValue does not necessarily have to be smaller than MaxSpeedValue

fields.name: MaxSpeedValue
fields.help: The value which puts the fan to the highest possible fan speed.

fields.name: MinSpeedValueRead
fields.help: The value which corresponds to the lowest possible fan speed. Will be ignored if IndependentReadMinMaxValues is `false`.

fields.name: MaxSpeedValueRead
fields.help: The value which  corresponds to the highest possible fan speed. Will be ignored if IndependentReadMinMaxValues is `false`.

fields.name: IndependentReadMinMaxValues
fields.help: Defines if independent minimum/maximum values should be applied for read operations

fields.name: ResetRequired
fields.help: Defines if the EC should be reset before the service is shut down.

fields.name: FanSpeedResetValue
fields.help: Defines the value which will be written to WriteRegister to reset the EC.

fields.name: NotebookModel
fields.help: The Notebook Model as described in your BIOS. See `sudo dmidecode -s system-product-name`.

fields.name: Author
fields.help: The Author of the config file. Enter whatever you want.

fields.name: EcPollInterval
fields.help: Defines how often NBFC polls the EC for changes (in miliseconds).

fields.name: CriticalTemperature
fields.help: If the temperature exceeds this threshold, NBFC will ignore all Temperature threshold elements and set the fan to 100% speed until the temperature drops below (`CriticalTemperature` - `CriticalTemperatureOffset`)

fields.name: CriticalTemperatureOffset
fields.help: See `CriticalTemperature`

fields.name: ReadWriteWords
fields.help: If `true`, NBFC will combine two 8 bit registers to one 16-bit register when reading from or writing to the EC registers.

fields.name: FanConfigurations
fields.help: Array of at least one FanConfiguration

fields.name: RegisterWriteConfigurations
fields.help: Array of RegisterWriteConfiguration

fields.name: SelectedConfigId
fields.help: The selected config model. This equals the basename of a notebook model configuration file.

fields.name: ReadOnly
fields.help: If `true`, fan speeds will not be written to the embedded controller

fields.name: EmbeddedControllerType
fields.help: Either `ECSysLinux` for using the `ec_sys` kernel module, or `ECLinux` for an alternative implementation using `/dev/port` without depending on kernel modules.

fields.name: TargetFanSpeeds
fields.help: This holds the fixed speed of the fans. A value of `-1` means the fan should be left in auto mode.
